Class DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Sources
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource with converging/diverging angle, length, width, source profile, direction, position, inward normal beam rotation and initial tissue region index.

public class DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource : DirectionalRectangularSource, ISource

DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource(double, double, double, double[], int, int, Direction, Position, PolarAzimuthalAngles, int)

Defines DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource

protected DirectionalArbitrarySurfaceSource(double thetaConvOrDiv, double sourceLengthX, double sourceWidthY, double[] image, int pixelLengthX, int pixelWidthY, Direction newDirectionOfPrincipalSourceAxis, Position translationFromOrigin, PolarAzimuthalAngles beamRotationFromInwardNormal, int initialTissueRegionIndex)

Parameters

thetaConvOrDiv double

Convergence(negative angle in radians) or Divergence (positive angle in radians) angle {= 0, for a collimated beam}

sourceLengthX double

The length of the arbitrary (image-based) Source

sourceWidthY double

The width of the arbitrary (image-based) Source

image double[]

image to be used as source

pixelLengthX int

pixel length X

pixelWidthY int

pixel length Y

newDirectionOfPrincipalSourceAxis Direction

New source axis direction

translationFromOrigin Position

New source location

beamRotationFromInwardNormal PolarAzimuthalAngles

Polar Azimuthal Rotational Angle of inward Normal

initialTissueRegionIndex int

Initial tissue region index
